snippet.title: Puzzle & Dragons GOLD - Nintendo Switch Trailer
snippet.description:
Puzzle & Dragons GOLD will be available as a digital download on the Nintendo eShop on January 15, 2020!

Experience Puzzle & Dragons with stunning new 3D models of the Leader Monsters, a first for the Puzzle & Dragons series!

Follow the Puzzle & Dragons anime - choose between the stories of Taiga or Ryuji and make their way through the Puzzle & Dragons Champions Cup, facing off with favorite characters along the way.

Play the brand new PvP mode to test your Puzzle & Dragons skills against friends and players all over the world!

Find out more on the Official Website: http://bit.ly/PADGOLDEN
